title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: Judging from the long period of time BTC has not accumulate any impression, I doubt if people are still investing because of many policies formulating against cryptosystem no industries and firm wants to risk their capital again. Would the system remains this way? Normally I understand this wasn't the first time BTC has experience this down slide but then it was normally market situations but now many billionares has withdrew interest in this project, then what is the hope of this project? Do you think BTC will experience better and high price?

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: No, I don't think it will rise, I know it will rise more than it's ATH.This is the type of thread you see when those lily-livered decides to invest in Bitcoin in the hope of becoming a millionaire or even billionaire the next morning after their investment. This type of thread only creates FUD and nothing more. Op, we have so many people that still are hodling their coin even when Bitcoin price dropped from ATH to the $15,000 and yet still not panicking because they know what they have involved themselves in.

comments.author: thecodebear
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 05, 2023, 05:55:25 PMJudging from the long period of time BTC has not accumulate any impression, I doubt if people are still investing because of many policies formulating against cryptosystem no industries and firm wants to risk their capital again. Would the system remains this way? Normally I understand this wasn't the first time BTC has experience this down slide but then it was normally market situations but now many billionares has withdrew interest in this project, then what is the hope of this project? Do you think BTC will experience better and high price?I guess you're new to Bitcoin. Yes of course it will rise. Bitcoin is always growing. As always the next 2-3 years it will go up and go far higher than the previous all time high price. In two years from today it is almost guaranteed it will be over $100k and likely continue going much higher than that before the next crash in 2026. This is what it does every market cycle. Nobody has lost interest. Interest is growing in Bitcoin as it always does. Bitcoin price will be in the millions of dollars eventually so there is no need to worry about if it will keep growing from $20k, because the answer is of course it will. Bitcoin is still very early in its adoption, nobody is worried about whether it will keep growing or not.

comments.author: KaliLinux
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 05, 2023, 05:55:25 PMJudging from the long period of time BTC has not accumulate any impression, I doubt if people are still investing because of many policies formulating against cryptosystem no industries and firm wants to risk their capital again. Would the system remains this way? Normally I understand this wasn't the first time BTC has experience this down slide but then it was normally market situations but now many billionares has withdrew interest in this project, then what is the hope of this project? Do you think BTC will experience better and high price?Is there proof of your claim that many billionaires have withdrawn interest in Bitcoin? No surprise here from a Newbie worrying about Bitcoin price  It took Bitcoin 1211 Days from the 2017 ATH to the 2021 ATH and from that time till now, we are just 686 days. There is no question whether Bitcoin will touch a new ATH cos it certainly will so just relax and buy some more

comments.author: Munir575
comments.body: Definitely Bitcoin will rise again. The next bull run is around the corner and I’m sure you know what that means. Don’t be surprised if it rises above its ATH because thats how it behaves. At the current down fall we I think we should be buying the dip and be prepared what the bull run will bring. I have never give up hope for once and I don’t think i ever will because we are yet to see what BTC have in store for us.

comments.author: huu78
comments.body: cannot be predicted with certainty, even if people say that bitcoin will repeat history, but we also have to look at the current economic conditions, if indeed world conditions have improved, then all markets will follow including bitcoin.

comments.author: panganib999
comments.body: Bitcoin started the year strong from a depressing and arguably hard to redeem year end, due to the fact that FTX made some pretty disastrous moves that were shed to light just last year, most of which involve the mismanagement of funds and when things went south, people couldn't withdraw their money which lead to further collapse and loss of confidence over bitcoin. Still, as the first part of my reply states, bitcoin surprisingly recovered and has since been retaining a relatively high price point at 20k. With the halving coming in next year there is a good possibility that bitcoin would be able to recover from its $60k ATH price point for a while before stabilizing once again, if things go really well we might even see it go as much as $80k or maybe even reach the coveted $100k mark.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 05, 2023, 05:55:25 PMNormally I understand this wasn't the first time BTC has experience this down slide but then it was normally market situations but now many billionares has withdrew interest in this project, then what is the hope of this project? And who exactly are those billionaires that lost interest in Bitcoin because I haven't noticed any known bitcoiners changing their mind drastically? Or you are  maybe referring to  Elon's tweet from few days ago in which  he said "I used to be in crypto, but now I am in AI" or something along those lines. If yes, then you shouldn't worry because he was never truly interested in bitcoin and he got into for shits and giggles and to make some money and not because he is into what Bitcoin represents. Bitcoin existed and did just fine before any of people like him showed up, and will do just fine without them.I guess this is your first bear market and that could explain why you are worried that bitcoin price will reach the previous all time high. All you have to do is zoom out the chart and see that this is nothing that hasn't happen before. Instead worrying about whether Bitcoin will survive, focus on acquiring as much as you during bear market as that's what this period is for.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Often hear about this question, but understand because I know you are still a newbie who doesn't know anything.Do you know about the previous bitcoin cycle which has increased several times more than ATH several times? Even investors are sure about the future of bitcoin they have saved a lot and accumulated bitcoin in any way when the price is down big investors don't even think about anything except buying more to wait for the next increase again, but I believe that bitcoin will be even higher.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 05, 2023, 05:55:25 PMJudging from the long period of time BTC has not accumulate any impression, I doubt if people are still investing because of many policies formulating against cryptosystem no industries and firm wants to risk their capital again. Would the system remains this way? Normally I understand this wasn't the first time BTC has experience this down slide but then it was normally market situations but now many billionares has withdrew interest in this project, then what is the hope of this project? Do you think BTC will experience better and high price?Hmm, I cannot quite put my finger on where you are gathering your intel, or if you're utilizing a savvy tool like Chat GPT to craft your content, but it appears your thoughts are a tad muddled. You posted this just a few days ago:Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AMThere is still hope and enough package to come from BTC, keep holding.Could you shed some light on this? Just yesterday, you were a believer in BTC and advised us to keep hodling, but today you're already questioning, "what's the hope in this project?" I am curious to know what might have triggered this change of heart? Where did you get the info that "many billionaires have withdrawn interest" in Bitcoin?

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 05, 2023, 05:55:25 PMJudging from the long period of time BTC has not accumulate any impression, I doubt if people are still investing because of many policies formulating against cryptosystem no industries and firm wants to risk their capital again. Would the system remains this way? The market is still fluctuating, it is one sign that it is active, others get out while others get in.  It is a sign of people or institution investing in Bitcoin market.Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 05, 2023, 05:55:25 PMNormally I understand this wasn't the first time BTC has experience this down slide but then it was normally market situations but now many billionares has withdrew interest in this project, then what is the hope of this project? As many billionaires withdraw interest in the project, there are far more normal people investing in Bitcoin in hopes to get a profit one day.  If a huge amount of fund is exiting the market, this creates a window for other interest parties to get into the Bitcoin market because Bitcoin is at a discounted price.Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 05, 2023, 05:55:25 PMDo you think BTC will experience better and high price?Haven't we just experience a Bitcoin surge recently?  from $16k+ to $24k,  what do you call this increase in price?

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Dumb question, due to the significant volatility of Bitcoin, which could pump and dump at any time. It appears that you have become very afraid of the most recent dump. I recall that you don't have much Bitcoin experience. Thereby further, you must study more about how a Bitcoin chart appears. If you own Bitcoin, your heart shouldn't feel weak. Otherwise, when you see a red line, you'll start to panic. It's common for cryptocurrency to pump and dump. But, I think you should read the forum more frequently. As a result, you might pick up a lot from this.

comments.author: danadc
comments.body: Let there be no doubt that btc is going to rise, btc is the best investment in the world, the fact that btc is a currency that has many enemies does not mean that they are going to knock it down with that, and bitcoin is not only going to rise,but which will be an example of what patience will always give its good results, there will be many regretting not having bought bitcoin at these current prices,but every second that passes is an opportunity that must be taken advantage of, if there is no money it is something understandable, but if there is or it is necessary to doubt it.

comments.author: Artemis3
comments.body: Never forget bitcoin is limited emission, fiat money isn't. So there can be only one outcome.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 05, 2023, 05:55:25 PMNormally I understand this wasn't the first time BTC has experience this down slide but then it was normally market situations but now many billionares has withdrew interest in this project, then what is the hope of this project? Do you think BTC will experience better and high price?You probably are doubting because you are a newbie and have had little experience with bitcoins that is why you are asking, but know that we have so much faith in bitcoin and it why we keep holding because we do not just think but know that the days will be better for bitcoins. The price of bitcoins is still not fixed yet, the current price is not the price bitcoin was a few months ago where it was lower, that tells you that the price of bitcoin will not remain the same by tomorrow, and even with the downward movement at times, the value of bitcoins is expected to rise really well when the next bitcoin halving occurs, which is in 2024.

comments.author: JamesBorn
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on March 05, 2023, 07:06:51 PMQuote from: Godlovesyou on March 05, 2023, 05:55:25 PMJudging from the long period of time BTC has not accumulate any impression, I doubt if people are still investing because of many policies formulating against cryptosystem no industries and firm wants to risk their capital again. Would the system remains this way? Normally I understand this wasn't the first time BTC has experience this down slide but then it was normally market situations but now many billionares has withdrew interest in this project, then what is the hope of this project? Do you think BTC will experience better and high price?Hmm, I cannot quite put my finger on where you are gathering your intel, or if you're utilizing a savvy tool like Chat GPT to craft your content, but it appears your thoughts are a tad muddled. You posted this just a few days ago:Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 03, 2023, 07:53:22 AMThere is still hope and enough package to come from BTC, keep holding.Could you shed some light on this? Just yesterday, you were a believer in BTC and advised us to keep hodling, but today you're already questioning, "what's the hope in this project?" I am curious to know what might have triggered this change of heart? Where did you get the info that "many billionaires have withdrawn interest" in Bitcoin? OP, must have gather information from a new source that's different from what makes him to encouraged keep holding. Most problem with newbies is that they're easily shake by any common stories and news update. I think he has few knowledge or less of BTC and he worked by opinion of people but I love this threads coming out often because many people out there are panicking, it will ushered opportunity for you guys who have grand knowledge and technical system of cryptocurrency to keep encouraging newbies in this forum.This dude is a bit confused of what must have trans-led through his mind hearing different opinion from people and internet. Don't worry BTC will blow the bubbles trumpet and you witness it, so relax your mind.

comments.author: teosanru
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 05, 2023, 05:55:25 PMJudging from the long period of time BTC has not accumulate any impression, I doubt if people are still investing because of many policies formulating against cryptosystem no industries and firm wants to risk their capital again. Would the system remains this way? Normally I understand this wasn't the first time BTC has experience this down slide but then it was normally market situations but now many billionares has withdrew interest in this project, then what is the hope of this project? Do you think BTC will experience better and high price?First of all why do you think BTC is not being accumulated right now during it's lows? Leave everything aside if you see the chart of BTC closely you'll see high volumes bars during last few weekly candles plus ofcourse you'll see price of bitcoin not falling beyond this point which means even after such heavy selling volumes price could not fall beyond this point so makes sense that this is accumulation only and nothing else.

comments.author: Ryu_Ar1
comments.body: Your question is simple and even we know the answer without thinking about it. Bitcoin will go up again and that's a virtual certainty regardless of the timing but I think everyone will agree that a new ATH is coming.Speaking of billionaires losing interest. Who? Elon? or someone else?When we say he is Elon we have to realize that he also has his own interests so when something like this happens he will definitely do that but we won't know his intentions in the future because he is a businessman with only profit and there could be other statements later about Elon going back to using bitcoin and I don't think I will be surprised if that happens.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Mate — thousands and thousands of us wouldn't be on Bitcointalk or in the broader Bitcoin community if we didn't think that bitcoin would rise in price again. Simple as that.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: I know many individuals will be losing interest in bitcoin like you said despite the risk behind it it has a lot of potentially installed does that have patience I can remember when bitcoin was 10,000 dollars and Bull came and everything changed, from the beginning if you want to invest in bitcoin your mind should be made up and your emotion should be controlled the goal is to hold and the major warning is to stay away from altcoins FTX should be enough lesson already too many, bitcoin will definitely bounce back in time.
